Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Therapeutic Uses/Cardiovascular Agents/Sodium Channel Blockers
Record.Description: A class of drugs that act by inhibition of sodium influx through cell membranes. Blockade of sodium channels slows the rate and amplitude of initial rapid depolarization, reduces cell excitability, and reduces conduction velocity.
